2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.
Good camera to carry around all the time

Pros1) Compact and light weight2) Waterproof, I would rather call it kid proof3) GPS works really well4) Wifi Tranfer - This is a feature worth having all the time, it works really well and you can even use your phone as a view finder and shoot photos5) Excellent Battery backup - I think Nikon is being modest by saying 200, it can go on for even 300+Cons1) None, cos I didn't pay for a DSLR camera to expect so
It could not replace a regular Point & Shoot

I am using the camera and didn't bought it from flipkart. The videos quality is very good. The photo quality is average. The normal Canon/Nikon point and shoot cameras can give better picture than this camera.This is water proof camera. This will be useful when you are going for hiking/trekking. I have tried in underwater also. If the lighting is good, it can take very good under water videos. I am just using this as backup camera.
Nikon Coolpix AW120 - Small Package, decent features

Just bought this Nikon Camera. Found it very handy and well built. Picture quality is better than average even in low light. GPS takes about 4-5 minutes to activate, but is fairly accurate. Pictures also record altitude information, which could be interesting when compiling those hiking trip pics.
Well built, natural light photos are great but flash photos are very different

The camera feels solid, though there is a little rattle of the lens when you shake the camera. Understand this rattle is normal from the service centre. The natural light photos are nice, but the ones taken with flash are terrible, quite often. I don't know whether it is my camera or generally so will take it to the service centre. With flash some photos are fine, but some photos are all bleached with excessive light. As you can see I am not a photography wizard, but am using this in auto, and have used several camera in the past. This is the worst with flash. Well I have got used to changing the more from Easy Auto for natural light and Auto for flash photos. Have dunked in water and no issues with that. Well built and solid. I would buy another camera if I had to again.

Pros:1- Real rugged (Read further for this)2- Very good in macro3- Very nice video quality4- Geo taggingCons:1- Manual focus, app for Windows fone and RAW format are missing2- App should be improved to take video3- Slow motion video is not so effectiveAfter a week of purchase when I was with this camera in the beaches of Goa, I realized that the sand went into the zooming lever section and zooming lever was not moving at all. This was real bad but I cant blame Nikon for this because they never claimed that its dust proof. It was my fault and I was sad on that because the camera was not even 7 days old. Reached back to guest house and thought is cleaning the camera. Kept it under tap water and used the brush came along with the kit. After 5 mins of cleaning, I realized all was well. Zoom lever started working. I could remove the sand properly. The camera was back like a brand new one. This was an awesome feeling and gave me confidence on the ruggedness of the camera. Anything is wrong of this sort, wash it.I go for swimming. I have taken it many times for in the pool, close to 16 feet deep. It works like charm. Video quality is very good.Images are quite sharp and colorful.I did a lot of food photography. It does this job wonderfully good. HDR works decently good. High speed, night portrait, beach, fireworks, etc. mode are good. Geo tagging does a good work. I have used WiFi and app for a live tweeting of an event and it went very good. Within 2 mins pics were online. Click + transfer + tweet = Done quick.Even if you have a DSLR, this is a must buy. I was taking pics easily when my DSLR friends were running away from waves and I clicked a star fish under water. Loving it.
Terrible low light photographs. Flash photos are very inconsistent

Don't buy this product, I am disappointed with the way the flash works. Daylight photos are good, and the camera robust. There is a rattle in the lens when the camera is off, apparently this is normal.
The picture quality of the camera in auto mode is worse than a phone camera. Please refrain from buying this product.

Its The Best digicam you can buy within ₹ 15000. I bought during the diwali mela and got it for around 14k. It actually is a Damn good Water proof device. Used it in Mauritius and very easy to clean also. I recommend it to every one. 5* to flipkart for awesome delivery, ie, in just 3 days. A definite must buy. The pouch, however, i received was smaller and had to buy separatly from Nehru Place, Delhi. I enquired abt the same model there, which i was getting around ₹2000 cheaper, ie, around ₹ 11500 but honestly i dont trust those shop keepers there. With Flipkart you have some sense of piece of mind that incase anything goes wrong, they can replace the item.
Picture quality not good. Bad low light photos and bad flash. Also i got the wrong camera case with my camera. The pouch is smaller than the camera.
